entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's best friend and a member of Dumbledore's Army.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A brilliant student and one of Harry's closest friends.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of the Weasley twins and a member of Dumbledore's Army.

entities.name: george
entities.description: The other Weasley twin and a member of Dumbledore's Army.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: A wizard who was involved in the story, according to Fred.

relationships.description: Fred mentions that Ludo Bagman was involved in something.
Harry asks if Ludo Bagman was involved in something.
Ron also asks about Ludo Bagman's involvement.
Fred mentions that they received leprechaun gold from Ludo Bagman as payment for a bet.
George disapproves of Ludo Bagman, calling him a 'stupid git'.
